song_name: Dancing On My Own - Tiësto Remix
lyrics:
15 contributorsdancing on my own tiësto remix lyricsverse 1
somebody said you got a new friend
does she love you better than i can
and its a big black sky over my town
i know where youre at i bet shes around

chorus
yeah i know its stupid i just gotta see it for myself
im in the corner watching you kiss her oh oh oh
and im right over here why cant you see me oh oh oh
and im giving it my all
im not the guy youre taking home ooh
i keep dancing on my own

verse 2
i just wanna dance all night
and im all messed up im so out of line yeah
stilettos on broken bottles
im spinning around in circles

chorus
and im in the corner watching you kiss her ohohoh
and im right over here why cant you see me ohohoh
and im giving it my all
but im not the guy youre taking home ooh
and i keep dancing on my own no nah
no nah
see calum scott liveget tickets as low as 62you might also likebridge
so far away but still so near
the lights come on the music dies
but you dont see me standing here
i just came to say goodbye

chorus
im in the corner watching you kiss her ohohoh
and im giving it my all
but im not the guy youre taking home ooh
and i keep dancing on my own and oh nah
sat down in the corner watching you kiss her oh no
and im right over here and why cant you see me oh no
and im giving it my all
but im not the guy youre taking home ooh
and i keep dancing on my own

outro
so far away but still so near
the lights come on the music dies
but you dont see me standing hereembed
